Action Items:

  • Review employee survey results. If none exist, send a survey targeting questions to the metrics listed above.
  • Schedule 1-1 interviews with key employees and leaders. Have 3-5 questions prepared to gain insight into company culture.
  • Review company values and note how these values apply to the above hierarchy.
  • Look at employee retention over the previous month, quarter, and year. Review exit interviews.
  • Document any existing leadership and management training, as well as employee onboarding programs.

Collateral: SWOT analysis of current stated and perceived company culture and leadership.
